title: Simple Profile Card
description: Create a basic profile card with an image, name, and description. Use the provided avatar image in your design.
instructions:
Build a profile card containing:
- Profile image (use: /assets/images/avatar-1.png)
- Name heading: 'John Doe'
- Role text: 'Web Developer'
- Short bio paragraph
- Centered layout
- Width: 300px
- White background with shadow
- Border radius: 15px

title: Product Card with Image
description: Design a product card showcasing an item with image, title, price, and a buy button. Reference image provided.
instructions:
Create a product card with:
- Product image (use: /assets/images/product-1.png)
- Product name: 'Wireless Headphones'
- Price: '$99.99'
- 'Add to Cart' button
- Card width: 280px
- Hover effect on button
- Clean, modern design

title: Hero Section with Background
description: Create an eye-catching hero section with a background image, heading, and call-to-action button.
instructions:
Build a hero section with:
- Background image (use: /assets/images/hero-bg-1.jpg)
- Overlay for text readability
- Main heading: 'Welcome to Our Platform'
- Subheading: 'Start your journey today'
- 'Get Started' button
- Centered content
- Full viewport height

title: Interactive Counter
description: Create a simple counter with increment and decrement buttons using JavaScript.
instructions:
Build a counter app with:
- Display showing current count (starts at 0)
- '+' button to increment
- '-' button to decrement
- Counter cannot go below 0
- Use provided icon images for buttons
- Center the counter on page

title: Contact Form with Validation
description: Build a complete contact form with client-side validation and styled error messages.
instructions:
Create a contact form with:
- Name, email, and message fields
- Submit button
- Validate: name (not empty), email (valid format), message (min 10 chars)
- Show error messages in red below fields
- Success message on valid submission
- Use provided form icon

title: Build a Profile Card
description: Create a centered profile card with user information and avatar image.
instructions:
Follow these steps to complete the task:
- Create a div with class 'profile-card'.
- Inside it, include an image with src='/assets/images/avatar-1.png' and class 'profile-img'.
- Add a heading with the name 'John Doe'.
- Add a paragraph with class 'role' containing 'Web Developer'.
- Add another paragraph with a short bio.
- Center the card horizontally and vertically.
- Set width to 300px, white background, 15px border radius, and box shadow.

title: Create a Navigation Bar
description: Build a responsive fixed navigation bar using flexbox.
instructions:
Follow these steps:
- Create a nav element with class 'navbar'.
- Inside it, include 4 anchor links: Home, About, Services, and Contact.
- Use flexbox to evenly space the links.
- Fix the navbar to the top of the page.
- Use background color #1f2937 and white text.
- On hover, change the link color to #60a5fa.
- Add padding of 20px.
